events.message: I recently received my order but the product is not what I expected. I would like to request a refund as soon as possible because the item doesn't match the description on your website.
The customer issue has been categorized under the Refund cluster due to their request for money back regarding a product not meeting expectations.
Support agent Caroline has been assigned to handle this refund request to assist the customer with the return process.
Hello! This is Caroline from customer support. I understand you want to request a refund for your recent purchase. I’m here to help you through the process.
Could you please provide the order number and let me know if the package has already been opened or if the product is still unused?
Thank you for your quick response. The order number is #45892 and the package was opened, but the product was never used as it wasn't as described.

We can definitely process a full refund for you. Please send the product back using the prepaid shipping label I’ll email shortly, and once received, your refund will be issued within 3-5 business days.
That sounds great, thank you for the clear instructions and quick help. I’ll send it back as soon as I get the label.
I have sent the prepaid shipping label to your email. Please let us know once you have shipped the item. We look forward to resolving your refund quickly.
Hi, we wanted to check if you have shipped the product back using the prepaid label and if you need any further assistance with the refund process.
Yes, I shipped the product yesterday and the tracking shows it’s on its way. Thanks again for your support!
We have received your returned product and processed your full refund. Please check your account for confirmation, and feel free to reach out if you have any questions.
Your refund case has been successfully closed. Thank you for your cooperation, and we hope to serve you better in the future.
We just sent you a short survey about your support experience today. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
